definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: One of the management measures being considered is to cull the herd; there are tens of thousands of them out there.
sentences.chinese: 一种在考虑的措施是精减马群，那有成千上万的马呢。

sentences.english: And arts with thy sweet graces graced be;
sentences.chinese: 用你的神笔做些艺术的精减。

definition: super-ministry system (reform aimed at streamlining government department functions)
to alleviate a burden on sb
to establish (a unit or department)/staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
to cut staff/to lay off employees
